questions.question: Have you got rapid swelling of your lips, face, tongue, mouth or throat?
Do you have any pain in your chest or upper back right now?
questions.help: You may also have pain in in your arms, shoulders, neck or jaw.

questions.question: Has a doctor ever diagnosed you with a heart attack?
Has a doctor told you that you have either of the following?
How does the skin on your chest, back or tummy feel?
Have you got a severe ripping or tearing pain in your chest or back that came on suddenly?
questions.help: This pain is intense and comes on out of the blue, it's not pain caused by coughing or a chest infection. It's not an aching, stinging or crushing pain.
answers: Yes - it's a sudden ripping or tearing pain
I have a different type of pain
